Where'd you learn to shoot like that?
My Ole Man gave me a Toy Cap Gun when I was a Kid, been shooting ever since.
Ivanhoe proceeds to teach Flip the Klan handshake.
Everyone is gone now. Ron walks through observing The Sce looking over the remnants of the gathering.
Ron picks up the Official Running Nigger Target full of Bullet Holes.
Patrice and Ron walk on a Nature Pathway alongside a Cree
Bernie Casey's a Badd Brother.
Cleopatra Jones was the one. It's about time We see a strong Sister like that...
...And Tamara Dobson played a Cop.
That was a Black Exploitation Movie. A fantasy. Real life's not like that. In real life there's no Cleopatra Jones or Coffy.
You don't dig Pam Grier? She's Fine as Wine and twice as Mellow.
Pam Grier is doing her Thing but in real life it's just Pigs killing Black Folks.
What if a Cop was trying to make things better.
From the inside?
Yeah, from the inside.
You can't make things better from the inside. It's a Racist System.
So just give up?
No!!! We fight for what Black People really need! BLACK LIBERATION!!!
Can't you do that from the inside!
No! You can't. White Man won't let us.
Ron gets frustrated. Patrice stops him.
What did Dubois say about "Double Consciousness"? "Twoness". Being an American and a Negro? Two Souls? Two Thoughts? Two warring ideals in one Dark Body?
I know how that feels. I'm Two damn people all the time!
But you shouldn't be! We shouldn't have a War going on inside ourselves. Why can't we just be Black People?
Because we're not there yet!
Well, I'm tired of waiting!
Patrice walks off. Ron sighs, walks to catch up to her, a puts his arm around Patrice.
Shaft or Superfly?
What?
Pick one, Shaft or Superfly?
A Private Detective over a Pimp any day and twice on Sundays.
Richard Roundtree or Ron O'Neal?
Richard Roundtree. Pimps Ain't No Heroes.
Ron O'Neal isn't a Pimp. He's just playing one.
That image does damage to Our People.
JESUS CHRIST!!! Give it a rest.
I can't you JIVE TURKEY.
They both LAUGH.
Knocking at the door. Ron opens it and finds Felix standi there. The two stare at each other for a moment, finally.
Wrong address.
Felix backs away as Patrice peeks from around Ron seeing Felix. Felix sees her, turning to walk away.
Who was that?
Ron watches Felix drive away.
Nobody.
Ivanhoe, Walter and Felix are in the kitchen talking, drinking beer and eating snacks. Flip enters.
Hey, sorry had to work late. How you guys doing?
Everyone greets Flip, but Felix says. Flip grabs a beer f a cooler, pops the tab.
You got a Twin.
Everyone goes quiet looking at Flip.
What?
You got a Twin.
Twin what?
A Twin-Twin and ya Twin is a NIGGER.
Flip looks dumbfounded. Felix nears him.
Looked in the Phone Book and went over what I thought was your place and found a Nig there.
Felix looks deadly. Ivanhoe and Walter look at Flip. Fina
My number's unlisted.

What address did you go to?
Over on... Bluestem Lane.
I don't live on Bluestem. I live off 21st Street...
So you don't know that Nigger?
Oh, that's that Nigger I keep in the woodpile.
Everyone laughs. Felix finally cracks a grin.
1813 South 21st Street. Come by sometime we'll have a Coors.
Ivanhoe and Flip clink cans.
And y'know what? That loud mouth Black Student Union Bitch that's been in the paper complaining about the Police. She was there.
That Fuckin' Cunt.
Like to close those Monkey Lips permanently.
Yeah, after I get em' 'round da Head of my Dick.
Everyone laughs, agreeing.
Ron takes a letter out of his Mailbox and excitedly rips A Letter from the KKK National Office. He grins and claps hands!
Flip stands looking at what looks like a Credit Card as R sits at his desk, leaning back, satisfied.
Are you Fucking kidding me?
What?
You don't cross those lines. This is about an Investigation. Not a... Relationship.
You're right, I'm messin' up. Hate to violate that Blue Wall of Silence.
Nice one.
Is Patrice a Target?
Maybe.
Ron goes quiet, concerned.
An excited Ron goes to the once stark empty white walls n covered with numerous Klansmen Photos. Ron SLAPS the Phot of Active Duty Soldiers.
We got Active Duty Soldiers from Fort Carson. Going to the CID with this.
Ron SLAPS the photo of Steve and Jerry.
Our Mystery Boys Steve and Jerry. Still don't know who they are.
Ron SLAPS photos of Felix, Ivanhoe, Connie.
We got Felix's Old Klan Crew.
Ron turns to Flip and he SLAPS a photo of Walter.
And we got new Klan Walter.
Walter's a General without an Army. Felix's Crew is stronger than him.
Flip looks at Ron, amazed.
You've really been talking to Devin Davis?
Oh Hell yeah!!!
Ron SLAPS The Large Photo of Devin Davis.
That's my Ace Boon Coon Running Partner! And now that you got that Ronny Boy. We are on a Roll, Baby!!!
Ron laughs and points at the KKK Membership Card and Flip picks it up.
CLOSE on the card as Flip reads it.
Member in Good Standing Knights of the Ku Klux Klan

I called to warn you, but you must have already taken off.

Ron, I wasn't raised Jewish. It wasn't a part of my Life. So I never thought much about being Jewish, was just another White Kid, didn't even have my Bar Mitzvah. No Chanukah for me. Christmas. In this job, you try to keep things at a distance. You put up a Shield so you don't feel anything... This shit is deep. Ron drives up and gets out of his Car and walks up meetin Patrice, Odetta, Hakeem and other Members of the Black Student Union outside holding flyers.
Patrice stands there looking very upset, she shoves a Fly out at Ron. He takes it, reads.
A drawing of a Hooded and Robed Klansman. Above the Drawi there's Text: You Can Sleep Tonight Knowing The Klan Is Awake.
Where'd you find them?
I found this one on my Car. But they're all over The Neighborhood, too.
Ron looks around seeing Residents and Students holding th Flyers, discussing them, some upset, others bewildered.
Do you think this is Real?
It's Real.
Hakeem, Odetta and the Others look around for them, pisse

Clearly, this is about the Black Student Union and you.
Me?

So the next time they'll have a Burning Cross out Front.
They're trying to get to you, like you said they want to intimidate make themselves feared. If you don't let 'em scare you. They got nothing. But keep your eyes open. Be Cool.
That's the problem we've been too Cool!
Way too Cool!
Maybe the both of you should call The Cops.
How we know this ain't some of the KKK's Honky-Pig-Partners passing out this Shit!
Patrice and Ron step away from Odetta and Hakeem. They wa and talk.
A Fleet of Pickups rides uphill. A Flat Bed on the end of Convoy has an Eighteen-Foot Wooden Cross fastened on it. A CSPD Patrol Car drives past The Convoy, headed downhill

Soak the Wood in Kerosene, we light a Cig on a pack of matches. Gives us time to Beat It before The Cross catches Fire. Safeguard against CSPD.

The Best. You can see it for Miles. Freaks out The Jew Media and puts Niggers on their Nigger Toes.
They ride in silence for a moment.
A lot of these Guys in The Army?
Yeah, even got a few in Active Duty.
Just finished my Second Tour in Nam.
Ivanhoe's eyes light up.
Oh yeah? Know anything about C-4?
Enough to make shit BLOW UP.
Flip stops talking. He might've revealed a bit too much.
Ron watches as Walter and Felix argue through Night Visio Binoculars. Ron says on the Walkie-Talkie.
Send another one.
Another Patrol Car passes.
Damn, that's The Second One. Pigs are out tonight.
The Convoy crests The Hill, pulls to The Side of The Road
The Klansmen dismount and gather around The Flatbed Truck carrying the Wooden Cross.
Another CSPD Patrol Car appears. It passes by, not slowin
That makes Three Piggy Wiggys.
Everyone stops what they're doing.
Felix turns and catches Flip's eye. It almost seems as if he's staring directly at Flip...
lowers them, grins to himself.
Good job, Men.
Peeling out, heading back down The Hill.
Patrice comes outside and gets in the Car taking off. Fel has been watching her the whole time sitting in his pick truck. He spits, tosses his cigarette and follows her.
It's late. Ron's alone on the phone in mid-conversation. is intercut with Devin Davis speaking on the sofa in his
...I don't share this with many people, but My family had a Colored Housekeeper growing up. Her name was Pinky. She was probably the closest Woman to me other than Mother.
That surprises me.
I know. People think I hate Negroes. I don't and The Organization doesn't either.
Ron gives a "This Is Crazy!" Look.
They just need to be with their own. That's what Pinky would say, she had no problem with Segregation because she wanted to be with her own kind.
Sounds like she was a Mammy to you.
She was. You ever see "Gone with the Wind"? Pinky was my Hattie McDaniel. She won an Oscar for Best Supporting Actress.
You were Scarlett and she was Mammy.
That's right. When she passed away it was like we lost one of the Family.
A good Nigger's funny that way. In that sense they're like a Dog. They can get real close to you and when you lose em'. Just breaks your heart.
Well said Ron.
I knew a Nigger once.
Didja?
Yeah. Nigger lived across the street from us. I must of been Six or Seven. His nickname was Butter Biscuit.
How'd he get that nickname?
He loved his Mama's Butter Biscuits.
Yum Yum!!!
Me and Butter Biscuit played together everyday. One day My Father came home early from work and told me I couldn't play with him anymore because I was White and Butter Biscuit was a Nigger.
Davis laughs.
That's rich.
Ron's face reveals the story is probably true, but revers
Ain't it.
Your Father sounds like a Terrific Man.
Thanks, Buddy.
Well, you're an upstanding White Christian Man. I tell you this is why we need more people like us in Public Office. To get this Country back on Track.
Amen.
For America to Achieve our Greatness... again.
Absolutely. Sure wish we had the chance to chat Face to Face.
In due time, my friend, in due time. I'll be in Colorado Springs for your initiation...
You'll be in Colorado Springs?
You bet your Mayflower Society Ass I will.
Ron smiles and takes a SMALL NOTE PAD from his jacket poc and writes something down.
Patrice sits in front of a MICROFILM READER.
Her Face is covered with EMOTION as she rolls through the ghastly photos of BLACK LYNCHINGS.
Ron is alone at his desk. He is on the Undercover Phone L

We need a new Leader. Someone everyone can unite behind. Felix would Love to be The One but we can't let that happen. He's a Crazy Sonofvabitch. A Loose Cannon. We need someone Articulate, who displays Great Leadership qualities...
It should be you, Ron. You should be Chapter President. You!!!
Ron sits there a moment, unable to say a word. After he COMPOSES HIMSELF:
That would be quite an Honor.
You will be Great...
I'll have to think about this. My father is very ill and he lives in El Paso. I won't have the time.
You're a Smart and Diligent Man. I've got no doubt you could handle it. OMITTED
The Car's parked across The Street from Felix's House. Ro listens in.
The Whole Chapter is present. Half of them are open-carry In a corner, Ivanhoe teaches Flip the historic Klan handshake.
CLOSE - Index and Middle Finger extended along The Inside Wrist.
I think it's time for some new Blood to get in here. I'm planning to step down as your President.
Members exchanged looks. Felix can't hide his smile.
I'd like to make a nomination... Mr. Ron Stallworth for Chapter President.
The Room is Silent.
We just met this Guy.
He just walked in off the street.
Let me ask a question. Is there anybody here that is willing to put their Neck on the Line for Ron?
I will vouch for Ron.
All eyes turn to Flip.
It's a Big Honor but I can't accept. Problem is, what you Good Men need is a President who will be constant, on CALL Day In, Day Out. I'll be back and forth between here and Dallas.
Ron on headphones squints, WORRIED, saying to himself.
El Paso, Flip, El Paso...
Dallas? I thought it was El Paso.
The rest of the Chapter Members are paying attention now.
Did I say Dallas?
You sure did.
Ron which One is it?
Make up your mind.
The whole Room waits.
Dallas is where my Plane layover is. El Paso is where my sick Father is.
They buy it. We think.
Dallas, where they killed that Nigger Lover Kennedy.
Where you learned that?
I can read.
The Chapter chatters in agreement.
I just hope my Father isn't cared for by some Texicano Spic Nurse.
Collective moans.
We'll pray for ya Pop's health.
And Big Spic Teets!!!
Ron is on the Undercover Phone Line. Sgt. Trapp sits behi him. Ron has his Receiver out so that Trapp can listen in
I'm anxious to meet you and it will be something I share with my Family for Generations to come.

head_text.subj: RON AND SGT. TRAPP WITH DEVIN DAVIS AT HIS DESK

text: I'm eager to meet you too, Ron.
Ron and Sgt. Trapp make eye contact. Sgt. Trapp nods, a l threatening to spring out of his Face.
Say, Mr. Davis... I just have to ask. Aren't you ever concerned about some Smart-Aleck Negro calling you and pretending to be White?
Sgt. Trapp covers his Mouth.
No, I can always tell when I'm talking to a Negro.
How so?
Take you, for example. I can tell you are a pure Aryan White Man by the way you pronounce certain words.
Sgt. Trapp is doubled over now.
Any examples?
Take the word "are". A pure Aryan like you or I would say it correctly... like "are". Negroes pronounce it "are-uh".
You are so White... Right. I want to thank you for this Lesson because if you had not brought it to my attention, I would never have noticed the difference between how We talk and how Negroes talk.
Sgt. Trapp is laughing so hard he is shaking violently. H shakes his head as if to implore Ron to stop.
From now on I'm going to pay close attention to my Telephone conversations so I can make sure I'm not talking to one of dem' Sneaky Coloreds.
Ron cups The Receiver, looks at Sgt. Trapp, whispers.
You okay?
Sgt. Trapp gets up and bumbles away. Ron speaks into The PHONE:
I would love to continue this conversation when you are in Colorado Springs. Beautiful here, Sir. God's Country.
That's what I've heard, Ron. You have a nice day.
You too, Sir. God Bless White America.
Ron hangs up, laughing. He calls to Sgt. Trapp:
It's over!!! You can come back!!!
Just then-- The Undercover Phone rings. Ron hesitates. It strange timing. He picks up.
Hello?
It's Felix.
Ron quickly cups The Receiver.
Catch you at a bad time?
Not at all. Just... finishing a Meal.
Meeting. My House. Now. Git ya Ass in gear and don't tell Mealy Mouth Walter.
Flip looks down at a Steel Door built into The Ground, it latch left open. He looks around. Paranoid.
Flip enters The Short Stairwell, steps to The Cement Floo

Flip finds an empty Crate, Squats.
Felix stands underneath a single hanging Light-Bulb.
In about a week's time, we will be welcoming Mr. Davis to our City.
Felix lets that hang in The Air for a moment.
Who's packing tonight?
Ivanhoe goes upside his head with his handgun.
I'm packed.
One by one, Brothers brandish Weapons. Except Flip.
Where's your Piece, Ron?
I don't carry it on me All The Time.
The Chapter Members laugh teasingly.
I got ya covered.
Won't happen again.
Felix reaches behind his back, pulls out a Sharpe & G .45 caliber and hands it to Flip.
We're gonna need your Good Shot come next Sunday.
What's gonna happen next Sunday?
A beat. Felix regards the rest of the Men with gravity.
The War is gonna come to us.
Fuck ya'.
Felix grins.
Looks like we got ourselves another Soldier.
Just make sure that when you're at The Steakhouse, you've got your new friend with Ya.
And give it a name.
Felix and Connie are in bed, she is lying on his chest.
Honey, you ever have second thoughts?
About what?
Killin' 'em.
Never think twice about Killin' Niggers.
Won't be able to take it back.
They're da' first of many Niggers that must die, Honey Bun.
I know. It's just... becoming so real. It's always seemed like a dream.
Felix sits up, reflecting, proud and determined.
I know. It's just so beautiful. We're cleansing this Country of a backwards Race of Monkey's. First the Spooks then the Kikes.
Felix sits up raising his hand like Martin Luther King.
Free at last! Free at Last! Thank God a'mighty - Free a' dem Niggers At Last!!!
They chuckle.
I love when you do that, Honey.
Connie looks into his eyes, also reflective.
You know, we've talked about killing Niggers for so many years and now it's really happening.
My Old Man always told me good things come to those who wait.
She touches the side of his face, very loving.
Thank you for bringing me into you Life. For loving me like you do and giving me a purpose, direction.
Y'know, this will be the Shot heard around The World.
The New Boston Tea Party.

Honey Bun, one day, The Great Historians will write about us like that. They'll say we were the Patriots that saved America. You and me. We turned the Tide. Saved our True White Race... it fact, saved an entire Nation and brought it back to its Glorious Destiny.
In a way, we're The New Founding Fathers.

Yes we are... Martha.
Indeed we are... George.

Names of Chapter Members?
